dmca.title: Copyrighted content is being freely distributed.
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: AnnAngel Admin. [mailto:admin@ann-angel.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 31, 2005 8:11 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyrighted content is being freely distributed.



Hello,

 

My name is Catalin Radu and I am the webmaster of http://ann-angel.com
<http://ann-angel.com/> 

 

I have written to abuse@theplanet.com and abuse@servermatrix.com several
times concerning with the offending page with no response.

 

The problem is that one of your customers is uploading content from our site
http://ann-angel.com <http://ann-angel.com/>  to
http://www.tuweberotica.com/privado/ann-angel.htm and distributing it freely
across forums and other various media.  He has, at the same, blacked out our
copyright watermarks from each image.  You will notice a black area at the
top or bottom of the images.  This was where our watermarks would be found.
You can see a sample of one of our galleries which he has stolen here:
http://ann-angel.com/samplepages/whiteskirt/index.html  (Should you require
access to Ann-Angel.com to see the rest of the galleries he has stolen
please contact us)  You can see where our watermarks which has blacked out
appear on the same images.  He has done so for 9 galleries total on Anna
herself and 2 guest models which ONLY WE have permission to use from the
webmaster of http://sweetnaturalgirl.com <http://sweetnaturalgirl.com/>
himself.

 

I have waited for about 1 month now for this page to be removed, without any
response from your staff.  I was now given this email address to contact and
I am for the last time.  I want this page taken down right away, and I wish
you would please inform your customer from http://tuweberotica.com
<http://tuweberotica.com/>  to stop stealing our content immediately.  This
is clearly a violation of copyright laws and can not be allowed to continue.

 

I wish you would handle this properly as to avoid further complications.  If
needs be, we at Digital Angel Images are prepared to take any necessary
legal action against ALL PARTIES INVOLVED with the theft and free illegal
distribution of our content.

 

I expect a timely response on your behalf and appreciate your full
cooperation in solving this matter.

 

If you need further information regarding this issue, please contact myself
or support@digiaimg.com and we would be glad to provide you with any info.

 

Thank you.

 

Sincerely,

Catalin Radu

 

http://digitalangelimages.com
